description: 9x19mm subsonic ammunition with a brass jacketed 140gr bullet. Standard lead core with a metallic jacket. Intended to use with suppresed weapon or in practice shooting.
9x19mm subsonic ammunition with a jacketed hollow point 147gr bullet. Combination of stopping power and reduced noise.

9x19mm subsonic ammunition with a brass jacketed 140gr bullet. Standard lead core with a metallic jacket. Intended to use with suppresed weapon or in practice shooting.  Someone was down on their luck when they hand-reloaded this one - it's filled with black powder instead of smokeless powder.  Expect lower velocity, muzzle smoke, and a dirtier barrel if you shoot it.

9x19mm subsonic ammunition with a jacketed hollow point 147gr bullet. Combination of stopping power and reduced noise.  Someone was down on their luck when they hand-reloaded this one - it's filled with black powder instead of smokeless powder.  Expect lower velocity, muzzle smoke, and a dirtier barrel if you shoot it.

9x19mm subsonic ammunition with a jacketed hollow point 147gr bullet. Combination of stopping power and reduced noise.  This one has been hand-reloaded by a survivor or perhaps a pre-Cataclysm hobbyist, leading to slightly inferior performance compared to factory-produced ammo.

9x19mm subsonic ammunition with a brass jacketed 140gr bullet. Standard lead core with a metallic jacket. Intended to use with suppresed weapon or in practice shooting.  This one has been hand-reloaded by a survivor or perhaps a pre-Cataclysm hobbyist, leading to slightly inferior performance compared to factory-produced ammo.
